CustomField.description: If checked, the action will be executed in a background job (Queueable). This is required for actions that perform callouts to external systems or are expected to run for a long time, preventing timeouts. The agent will respond to the user immediately that the task has started.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this for actions that take a long time or need to make API callouts (e.g., calling an external system). The agent will not wait for the result to respond to the user.
CustomField.label: Run Asynchronously
